name: Bubble Blaster -- Lite
description:
Like Collapse or Bubble Shooter - you are at the right place. You will enjoy this variation of those classical games with infinite number of various combinations. Blast the bubbles into the swarm. Match the colors to remove them off the board. Be careful not to overflow the board or you loose. Too impatient to wait for the complete turn - tilt the phone to move launching bubble left/right.

Don't forget to check our Game section for other fun games...
